description.title: Introduction
description.paragraph: You can compare the damage, defense, hitpoints, AI type, and environments of enemies in the sortable enemy list.
In total, there are 235 enemies: 64 Pre-Hardmode, 74 Hardmode, 8 uncommon, 44 Event, 16 Bosses, 5 Event Bosses, 10 Bosses' servants, and 19/mobile-exclusive.
